name: Dark Willow
title: Mireska Sunbreeze
lore: Children love telling scary stories, but Mireska Sunbreeze, the Dark Willow, is the scary story herself.

brambleMaze.name: Bramble Maze
brambleMaze.description: Creates a maze of brambles that root and damage enemies who enter.

shadowRealm.name: Shadow Realm
shadowRealm.description: Dark Willow recedes into the shadows, becoming untargetable. Her next attack deals bonus damage.

cursedCrown.name: Cursed Crown
cursedCrown.description: Places a curse on a target that stuns them and enemies around them after a delay.

bedlam.name: Bedlam
bedlam.description: Dark Willow's companion Jex attacks nearby enemies rapidly.
